    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111432</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Short tandem repeat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Tandemwiederholung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Répétition tandem courte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Repeat em tandem curto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ripetizione in tandem corta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοντός διαδοχικός επαναλαμβάνει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Repetición en tándem corta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two variants of the short tandem repeat where one strand of DNA has six repeats of the -A-A-T-G- sequence (top), while the other has eight (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">-A-A-T-G- sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromosomes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrophoresis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short tandem repeat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">STR</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Varianten der kurzen 
Tandemwiederholung, in der eine Faser DNA sechs Wiederholungen von hat
- A-A-T-G- Reihenfolge (Oberseite), während das andere acht hat 
(Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux variantes de la 
répétition tandem courte où un brin d'ADN a six répétitions de - 
ordre d'A-A-T-G- (dessus), alors que l'autre a huit (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra dois variants do repeat em 
tandem curto onde uma costa do DNA tem seis repeats do - seqüência 
de A-A-T-G- (alto), quando o outro tiver oito (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due varianti della 
ripetizione in tandem corta dove un filo di DNA ha sei ripetizioni del
- sequenza di A-A-T-G- (parte superiore), mentre l'altro ha otto 
(parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ότι δύο παραλλαγές 
κοντού του διαδοχικού επαναλαμβάνουν όπου ένα σκέλος του DNA 
έχει έξι επαναλαμβάνει της - α-τ-γ - ακολουθίας (κορυφή), ενώ 
άλλο έχει οκτώ (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos variantes de la 
repetición en tándem corta donde un hilo de DNA tiene seis 
repeticiones del - secuencia de A-A-T-G- (tapa), mientras que el otro 
tiene ocho (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">- A-A-T-G- Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chromosomen</string>
          </keyword>
